title: BRAND NEW PS5, CYBERPUNK 2077 SEQUEL TALKS & MORE
description:
Thank you Raycon for sponsoring this video. Go to https://buyraycon.com/gameranx and use code BIRTHDAY to get 20 to 40% off sitewide during Raycon’s Anniversary Sale! Brought to you by Raycon.

Xbox finalizes the acquisition of Activision Blizzard, Sony announces a new PS5, Cyberpunk sequel updates and more in a week full of gaming news.
